body: Kenne discusses shallow reporting on LGBTI topics in East Africa: "It’s about time queers started consciously nurturing their stories and those of their own so as not to be robbed of our dignity and integrity by the press, out to ‘tabloidize’ anything not directly related to politics."
original_body: Kenne discusses shallow reporting on LGBTI topics in East Africa: "It’s about time queers started consciously nurturing their stories and those of their own so as not to be robbed of our dignity and integrity by the press, out to ‘tabloidize’ anything not directly related to politics."
title: Africa: Reporting LGBTI news in East Africa
